ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Do you worship something you have carved
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Why do you worship these you carve yourselves," he asked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Abraham said to them: “Do you worship what you yourselves have carved with your own hands
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "How can you worship what you yourselves have carved
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “What! You worship what you yourselves have sculpted?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Worship you that which you (yourselves) carve"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Said he: What! do you worship what you hew out?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Do you serve what you hew,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Worship ye that which ye yourselves do carve
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but he said, "How can you worship things you carve with your own hands,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: worship ye that which carve.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Do you worship what you have yourselves carved,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Worship ye that which ye have (yourselves) carved?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Worship you that which you (yourselves) carve?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Do you worship what you, yourselves have carved
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Do you worship what you carve?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Do you worship that which you [yourselves] carve,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:95] He said, to them in reproach: ‘Do you worship what you [yourselves] have carved, out of stone and other materials, idols,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Abraham said to them: (Worship ye that which ye yourselves do carve) with your own hands from 512 stones and wood,
